question: Analyze the social media presence and engagement metrics of companies in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies that belong to the technology industry and are currently active.
Retrieve the Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments, shares) for the identified technology companies.
Gather Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) for the active technology companies.
Collect Twitter engagement data (likes, retweets) for the same companies to compare their social media performance across platforms.
Compile and analyze the collected data to evaluate the overall social media presence and engagement levels of the technology companies.
